Major ports and transshipment hubs are facing severe congestion, causing unpredictable delays,  As a result, carriers are unable to guarantee service or transit times as initially scheduled.

Our services offered, including transit times and routing, are based on estimated carrier schedules, which are subject to change without prior notice.

We strongly recommend avoiding Sea Freight mode for time-sensitive shipments.
